skins.shipDescription: Kagerou-class destroyer number thirteen C Hamakaze.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Hamakaze, 13th Kagerou-class destroyer. Although I took part in quite a few battles, it feels like I spent more time rescuing friends than sinking foes... And now, I fight once more to protect my friends.
skins.acquisition: Hamakaze, 13th ship of the Kagerou-class destroyers, reporting for duty. Commander, try not to get my name wrong.
skins.login: Now's not the time to lose focus, Commander.
skins.details: This time too... I swear to protect my friends!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Tanikaze, until you finish your training, don't expect to get much beauty sleep!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Though I may be but a single destroyer, I'll still do all I can to protect everyone.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Bou-no-misaki... where it all came to an end...
skins.secretaryTouch: Hm? What are you looking at, Commander?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eek! ... Commander, just where do you think you're touching?

skins.shipDescription: Commander, have you been having more fun since I arrived? ... I see, that's great! Ehehe... Hamakaze, getting hyped!
skins.acquisition: Commander, have you been having more fun since I arrived? ... I see, that's great! Ehehe... Hamakaze, getting hyped!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Could you stop poking my cheek, Tanikaze... Hey, stop! No poking there, especially!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I love seeing my friends smile. That's why...
skins.secretaryIdle3: It's not over yet... This time, I'll triumph... at Bou-no-misaki.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, I think you can see further if you do it like this.

skins.shipDescription: Learning is exciting. The joy of acquiring new knowledge, the sense of achievement from solving difficult problems... you'll understand once you try it. So, shall we study together, Commander?
skins.acquisition: Learning is exciting. The joy of acquiring new knowledge, the sense of achievement from solving difficult problems... you'll understand once you try it. So, shall we study together, Commander?
skins.login: Commander, were you able to solve that question from yesterday?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Urakaze, Isokaze, Tanikaze, have you all taken your seats? Then let's review the essentials of the last formula we studied.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Improve yourself so that you can better protect those you care about. That's why I study as hard as I do.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Here we'll use this equation, then do this... Hah, a trivial question like this is no issue for me.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, you won't find the answer underneath my skirt.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, take your reading more seriously!
